original_text: Then the angel of the Lord moved on. He stood in a very narrow place where there was no space to turn round.
korean_text: 여호와의 사자가 더 나아가서 좌우로 피할 데 없는 좁은 곳에 선지라

sentences.original_text: Then the angel of the Lord moved on.
He stood in a very narrow place
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 매우 좁은 곳에 서 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: where there was no space to turn round.
